exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat The term "2" has type "nat" while it is expected to have type "?d <> 0".

original: destruct (euclid n 2 Nat.two_succ) as [q [r H1]]. destruct r. - exists q. left. apply div_rem_spec1 with (p:=2). rewrite H1. cbn. auto. - exists (q+1). right. apply div_rem_spec1 with (p:=2). rewrite H1. cbn. auto.
